verbose_text: Hence, a major task of the auxiliary ESCRTs is to prevent the deleterious accumulation of Shrub at the endosomal membrane at lower temperature in poikilothermic organisms, probably by enhancing the activity of Vps4.
evidence: task of the auxiliary ESCRTs is to prevent the deleterious accumulation of Shrub at the endosomal membrane at lower temperature in poikilothermic organisms, probably by enhancing the activity of Vps4
